name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing scalable and high-performance applications using **.NET**, **C#**, **.NET Core**, **ASP.NET Web API**, and **Entity Framework**. My technical proficiency extends to **TypeScript**, **Vue.js**, **Vuex**, **Pinia**, and database solutions such as **MSSQL** and **PostgreSQL**. I have a strong command of implementing **RESTful APIs** and have successfully integrated cloud services including **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**.

I possess extensive knowledge of **CI/CD** practices, alongside experience with **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and infrastructure as code tools such as **Terraform** and **Helm**. My background in microservices architecture and messaging systems like **RabbitMQ**, **Kafka**, and **Azure Service Bus**, allows me to design robust and efficient systems.

In addition to my technical skills, I emphasize strong collaboration, mentoring, and agile methodologies including **TDD** and **BDD**. I am adept at conducting unit, integration, and end-to-end testing to ensure the delivery of high-quality software solutions. My previous roles in the healthcare and financial domains have honed my ability to meet compliance requirements and deliver innovative solutions aligned with industry standards.
